TextEng: It's you! It's <FullName>! I love you! I mean, I love your fighting! You took Fashi! Hell, you took Agar!
Text: 당신이야! <FullName>이야! 사랑해! 아, 당신 싸움을 사랑한다고! 파시를 이겼어! 아가르도!

TextEng: Hey there! You are doing pretty good! You got a good medal on you!
Text: 이봐! 꽤 잘하네! 좋은 메달 땄잖아!

TextEng: What? Why would I talk to you? You've got no medals. Feh!
Text: 뭐야? 왜 당신한테 말을 걸어? 메달도 없잖아. 흥!

TextEng: Sure. See you. Good luck! You're great!
Text: 그래. 또 봐. 행운을 빌어! 멋져!

TextEng: That's right, goodbye. As if I've got time for no-medals like you. Beat it.
Text: 맞아, 잘 가. 메달도 없는 놈한테 시간 낭비 안 하니까. 꺼져.

TextEng: A newcomer wants to know about the fighters? HA! Like it matters! You'd have to beat the mighty Hrusk before you're even ranked!
Text: 신참이 전사들에 대해 알고 싶다고? 하! 알아봤자! 순위에 들려면 위대한 흐루스크부터 이겨야 하는데!

TextEng: Hrusk has a fine pet, and he's got that flaming axe, you know? Burn the hair right off you, it would. Even the short stuff!
Text: 흐루스크는 훌륭한 펫도 있고, 불타는 도끼도 들었어, 알지? 머리카락 싹 태워버릴걸. 짧은 것까지!

TextEng: Go away. I'm done talking to your worthless butt.
Text: 꺼져. 쓸모없는 놈한테 할 말 끝났어.

TextEng: I can't believe I'm talking to you. I mean, sure, maybe you used to be a no-medals, but look at you now! WOW!
Text: 믿을 수 없어, 당신한테 말하고 있다니. 물론 예전엔 메달 없는 놈이었지만, 지금 좀 봐! 와우!

TextEng: Thanks! <He/She> said thanks! To me! Everyone see that?! Damn right!
Text: 고맙대! 나한테 고맙대! 다들 봤지?! 그렇고말고!

TextEng: I can't believe it! <CUSTOM710> is just the best! The BEST! That was great!
Text: 믿을 수 없어! <CUSTOM710>은 최고야! 최고! 진짜 멋졌어!

TextEng: Hmph... wins a few medals and gets all tight... but WOW, that <FullName> can fight! Did you see <him/her> brush me off? ME!
Text: 흥... 메달 몇 개 땄다고 거만해지고... 하지만 와우, <FullName>은 싸움 진짜 잘해! 날 쌩까는 거 봤어? 나를!

TextEng: Claudus? He's just great! It's like... I don't know! It's like he's almost invulnerable! Some people complain that he's so good, but they just can't compete.
Text: 클로더스? 진짜 대단해! 뭐랄까... 모르겠어! 거의 무적 같아! 너무 잘한다고 불평하는 사람들도 있지만, 그냥 상대가 안 되는 거지.

TextEng: I mean, everything is fair, right? His pets are normal, like everyone elses, and he doesn't use any magic weapons or anything. He just seems like a super fighter!
Text: 공정하잖아, 그렇지? 펫도 딴 애들이랑 똑같고, 마법 무기 같은 것도 안 써. 그냥 엄청 잘하는 거야!

TextEng: Agar is the Third Round Medal fight. He's real tough, got a nice pet, and he's got something nasty too.
Text: 아가르가 3라운드 메달 전이야. 진짜 강하고, 훌륭한 펫도 있고, 뭔가 심술궂은 것도 있지.

TextEng: Fashi is the Second Round Medal fight. He looks small but boy, he can sure take it. It's amazing, it is.
Text: 파시가 2라운드 메달 전이야. 작아 보이지만 와, 얼마나 버티는지. 놀라워, 진짜.

TextEng: Oh, sure. I mean, each guy has a specialty, but that's all known before a fight begins, if you ask around.
Text: 아, 물론이지. 각자 특기가 있거든, 근데 싸움 시작 전에 물어보면 다 알 수 있어.

TextEng: Except for Claudus. He's got no special thing, but he seems super-tough anyway. He's just that good.
Text: 클로더스만 빼고. 특별한 건 없는데, 어쨌든 엄청 강해 보여. 그냥 그만큼 잘하는 거지.

TextEng: His weapon poisons. People complained at first, but they got used to it. He's just tough anyway, so he's proved his worth.
Text: 무기에 독을 묻히거든. 처음엔 사람들이 불평했지만, 익숙해졌어. 어차피 강하니까, 실력은 증명했지.

TextEng: You just can't cut him or poke him. He's so focussed. He bruises though. I noticed that. He's not invulnerable.
Text: 베어도 찔러도 안 통해. 너무 집중해서. 근데 멍은 들더라. 눈치챘어. 무적은 아니야.

TextEng: Don't worry about that. You won't get to him. The others are plenty tough, but Claudus is just plain scary.
Text: 걱정 마. 거기까지 못 가니까. 다른 애들도 충분히 강하지만, 클로더스는 그냥 무서워.
